author: Redazione
title: Da Capodanno all’Epifania al Museo e Real Bosco di Capodimonte
text:
[](/blog/napoli-eri-la-padrona-del-mondo/senza-luce-riscaldamenti-napoli.html)
Da 9 giorni senza luce e riscaldamento, avvolta nell’atmosfera della grotta del bambin Gesù. E non sono la Madonna
[Januaria Piromallo](/blog/napoli-eri-la-padrona-del-mondo/)
Capodanno ed Epifania d'arte e natura al Museo e Real Bosco di Capodimonte.
Il 1º gennaio 2024 il Museo sarà aperto dalle 10.00 alle 18.00 con ultimo ingresso alle 17.00, per un Capodanno d’arte.
Il Museo sarà aperto tutti i giorni dal 1º gennaio al 6 gennaio 2024 escluso il mercoledì (giorno di chiusura settimanale).
Il Real Bosco e il parco saranno sempre aperti, nei consueti orari.
Un'occasione da non perdere per scoprire i capolavori della Collezione Farnese, le meraviglie della Galleria delle cose rare e preziose, la Collezione De Ciccio, la Galleria delle Arti a Napoli dal ‘200 al ‘700, il Corridoio Barocco, le Mostre in corso (Oltre Caravaggio e l’opera Damasa di Gian Maria Tosatti al secondo piano del Museo e Napoli Explosion nel Cellaio del Real Bosco di Capodimonte) e a rivivere i fasti delle sale dell’Appartamento Reale.

author: @nbc6
title: Milwaukee-based retail giant Kohl's says ‘No' to sponsoring Republican convention events
text:
Wisconsin-based department store giant Kohl’s will not sponsor any events related to the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee this July. Kohl’s is one of the few big companies in Wisconsin that’s opted out of the convention in Milwaukee. Wisconsin based Northwestern Mutual and Fiserv are among the companies sponsoring the event. Milwaukee based department store giant Kohl’s says it will not sponsor any events related to the Republican National Convention in that city this summer, where Donald Trump will be crowned the party ‘s nominee for president.
“Kohl’s is not a political organization nor donor and is not sponsoring nor engaging in any specific RNC events,” a spokeswoman for the company told CNBC. “We support the business community through the Metropolitan Milwaukee Association of Commerce.”
The convention is expected to bring around 50,000 people to the Brew City from July 15 – 18, culminating in Trump’s all but certain acceptance of his party’s nomination on the final night.
The announcement comes as both Republicans and Democrats are scrambling to secure corporate support for their party conventions at a time when many big name brands are trying to stay far away from politics.
Among Wisconsin’s largest companies on the Fortune 500, the top two are planning to directly sponsor the convention: Northwestern Mutual and Fiserv. The next two, ManpowerGroup and Kohl’s, are not.
ManpowerGroup told CNBC it is supporting the nonprofit Milwaukee 2024 Host Committee through donations to the Metropolitan Milwaukee Association of Commerce (MMAC).
“We have not directly provided funds to the RNC but rather MMAC has provided funds on our and others behalf, just like they did for the DNC [Democratic National Convention],” a spokeswoman said.
Northwestern Mutual, on the other hand, is on the host committee, and its CEO John Schlifske is reportedly helping to raise money for the group.
Trump narrowly won Wisconsin in his first presidential campaign in 2016. But he lost the state to President Joe Biden in 2020. The state is viewed by both Republicans and Democrats as a must-win this November.
Kohl’s has not funded either the Republican or Democratic conventions for over a decade, according to Federal Election Commission filings.
In 2002, the company donated $10,000 to the Republican National Committee’s state elections committee, with funds mostly dedicated to GOP state parties, according to FEC records. The state’s late Democratic senator, Herb Kohl, was president of his family-founded company until the late 1970s.
The absence of Kohl’s from the list of Republican convention sponsors notable, given that convention organizers have publicly touted the importance of Wisconsin-based companies helping to fund and organize the event.
Former Trump chief of staff Reince Priebus, who is chair of the city’s host committee, told The Wall Street Journal that virtually all of Wisconsin’s Fortune 500 companies have pledged financial support. The Republican convention is aiming to raise roughly $70 million.
Representatives for the Republican National Committee and the Milwaukee host committee did not return requests for comment.
Kohl’s’ decision to hold off on donating to the convention coincides with the company’s renewed effort to find its footing in a competitive market.
Kohl’s is chasing a turnaround and trying to capitalize on its locations in suburban strip malls, especially as rival Macy’s closes about 150 of its namesake stores .
Yet, the company’s sales have been shrinking and it has relied on an aging customer base as it competes with an expanding field of retail competitors, including Target, Shein and Amazon.
Kohl’s stock tumbled more than 20% earlier this month, after it missed Wall Street’s expectations for earnings and revenue.
It’s been trying to woo younger shoppers by opening more Sephora shops inside of Kohl’s, adding Babies R Us shops and expanding its mix of trendier merchandise, such as more fashion-forward apparel and a larger department of home décor.
CNBC’s Melissa Repko contributed to this story.

author: R. H.
title: Tres jugadores de la Primitiva de este jueves ganan más de 400.000 euros
text: Loterías y apuestasTres jugadores de la Primitiva de este jueves ganan más de 400.000 euros Secciones Servicios Destacamos Loterías y apuestasTres jugadores de la Primitiva de este jueves ganan más de 400.000 euros R. H. Jueves, 14 de marzo 2024, 22:51 Necesitas ser suscriptor para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Compartir La combinación ganadora del sorteo de la Primitiva celebrado este jueves, 14 de marzo, ha estado formada por los números 1, 7, 10, 18, 41 y 43. El número complementario es el 13 y el reintegro, el 2. El Joker ha sido 3753774. La recaudación ha ascendido a 10.812.564 euros. En el sorteo de La Primitiva de hoy no existen boletos acertantes de Categoría Especial (6 aciertos + Reintegro), por lo que con el bote generado que se pondrá en juego en el próximo sorteo de La Primitiva, un único acertante de Primera Categoría con Categoría Especial podría ganar 15.500.000 euros. De Primera Categoría (6 aciertos) existen tres boletos acertantes, que han sido validados en la Administración de Loterías nº 17 de Alicante, situada en Olof Palme, 2 L-6 (entrada por Pintor Baeza); en la nº 11 de Avilés (Asturias), situada en el Centro Comercial «El Atrio» calle La Cámara, 37 L-B29B y en el Despacho Receptor nº 98.235 de Alcalá de Henares (Madrid), situado en avenida Reyes Católicos, 48. Cada uno de los agraciado ha ganado 407.332,24 euros. author: @eldeber
title: Alcaldesa pandina protagonizó encuentro con el Papa Francisco | El Deber
text: Alcaldesa pandina protagonizó encuentro con el Papa Francisco La salutación de Ana Lucia Reis con el sumo pontífice se produjo en el cierre de ese evento el 23 de mayo pasado. La alcaldesa de Cobija y presidenta de la Asociación de Municipios de Bolivia (AMB), Ana Lucia Reís, saludó al Papa Francisco en El Vaticano donde se realizó el Encuentro Internacional del Sentido. La salutación de Reis con el sumo pontífice se produjo en el cierre de ese evento el 23 de mayo pasado. "Agradezco a las instituciones que brindaron esta oportunidad de haber tenido el honor de encontrarnos con su Santidad", escribió la alcaldesa en su cuenta de Facebook. Reis junto a líderes y representantes de diversas partes del mundo asistieron al Encuentro Internacional del Sentido, promovida y financiada por el Movimiento Educativo Scholas Ocurrentes y el Banco de Desarrollo de América Latina y el Caribe (CAF). El evento se llevó adelante en respuesta al llamado del Papa Francisco para poner en marcha la Universidad del Sentido que tendrá la misión de abordar la crisis del sentido y la promoción de valores universales. "Valoró mucho el haber sido tomada en cuenta como mujer de la Amazonía boliviana", señaló la alcaldesa de Cobija que también es copresidenta de las Ciudades y Gobiernos Locales Unidos (CGLU).

author: @ukrinform
title: Stoltenberg: Ukraine has right to use Western weapons against targets in Russia
text:
Stoltenberg: Ukraine has right to use Western weapons against targets in Russia 11.07.2024 21:43 Ukrinform Repelling Russian aggression, Ukraine has a legal right to use weapons it received from partners to strike legitimate targets inside Russia. According to an Ukrinform correspondent, NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg said this during a press conference with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky after their meeting in Washington on Thursday.
He said there was no doubt that Ukraine has the right to use the weapons it has - of its own production and weapons provided by allies - to strike legitimate military targets on Russian territory.
According to Stoltenberg, it is important to remember that this is a war of aggression launched by Russia against its democratic friendly neighbor - Ukraine.
"Russia invaded Ukraine. That's a blatant violation of international law, and according to international law, Ukraine, of course, has the right to self-defense. NATO allies have the right to help and uphold Ukraine's right to self-defense without becoming a party to the conflict. And the right of self-defense includes also the right to strike legitimate military targets on the territory of the aggressor - Russia," he said.
In this regard, he welcomed the fact that some allies reduced and some others did not impose restrictions on the use of weapons provided by Ukraine, and "this has enabled Ukraine to strike legitimate military targets on the territory of Russia."

author: Bruno Lancini
title: Maestro di judo ed ecologista: tutto il paese piange Bruno Lancini
text:
Cronaca
Palazzolo sull'Oglio
Maestro di judo ed ecologista: tutto il paese piange Bruno Lancini
Ex assessore e fondatore di Ekoclub, si è spento a 71 anni
"Un uomo dai molti talenti, generoso e sempre disponibile, che ha dedicato gran parte della sua vita alla nostra comunità". Così il sindaco di Palazzolo sull'Oglio, Gianmarco Cossandi, ricorda Bruno Lancini, ex assessore, maestro di judo e fondatore dell'associazione Ecologica Italica (ora Ekoclub). Lancini si è spento all'età di 71 anni. L'ultimo saluto è previsto per le 14 di venerdì 31 gennaio: il funerale sarà celebrato nella chiesa parrocchiale di San Pancrazio.
In queste ore, l'intera comunità si stringe attorno alla sua famiglia: la moglie Angela, i figli Silvio, Amerigo e Riccardo, e i suoi amati nipoti. Numerosi i messaggi di cordoglio, tra cui quello della judoka Alice Bellandi, medaglia d'oro alle Olimpiadi di Parigi 2024. La campionessa è stata una delle tante allieve di Lancini: aveva insegnato judo per decenni, lasciando un'impronta indelebile nella vita di molti giovani.
Oltre al suo ruolo di assessore (dal 2009 al 2012), Lancini si è distinto per il suo impegno nella tutela dell'ambiente e nella rigenerazione delle aree verdi. A lui si deve la nascita dell'iniziativa scolastica "La Giornata dell'Albero" e l'ideazione dei workcamp, che hanno portato a Palazzolo giovani da tutto il mondo per progetti di volontariato ambientale. "Ha sempre lavorato con entusiasmo e passione per lasciare un segno positivo, e ci è riuscito in tanti modi", si legge ancora sui canali social del sindaco Cossandi. Un impegno instancabile che gli è valso la Benemerenza Civica del Comune.

author: Emerson
title: Lady Gaga chega ao Brasil e manda apagar luzes de aeroporto; fã fica frustrada e desiste de show
text:
A chegada de Lady Gaga ao Brasil na madrugada desta terça-feira (30), causou alvoroço e indignação. A cantora aterrissou no Aeroporto Internacional Tom Jobim, no Rio de Janeiro, por volta das 4h50, mas sua entrada no país foi marcada por uma exigência inusitada: todas as luzes de uma área externa do terminal precisavam estar apagadas. A solicitação partiu de sua equipe e foi cumprida.
A cena incomum se deu no espaço VIP RIOgaleão Exclusive, onde Gaga desembarcou acompanhada de seis pessoas. A medida, considerada exagerada por muitos, gerou críticas até de fãs, principalmente por representar riscos de segurança a quem circulava pelo local no escuro. Tudo foi feito para que a estrela entrasse em seu carro de forma discreta, longe dos holofotes, mesmo com fãs aguardando ansiosos por um aceno atrás de grades de contenção.
Segurança reforçada e acesso restrito causam polêmica
Depois do aeroporto, Gaga seguiu em comboio escoltado por batedores até o hotel Copacabana Palace. Novamente, evitou a multidão e entrou pelos fundos, frustrando os admiradores que a esperavam na porta principal.
Apesar de ser uma apresentação gratuita, o evento deve custar mais de R$ 30 milhões aos cofres públicos, somando gastos dos governos estadual e municipal. A expectativa é que mais de 1,6 milhão de pessoas compareçam ao espetáculo no sábado (3), o que justifica o grande aparato de segurança.
Discrição e controle total marcam passagem da diva pelo Brasil
Uma fã de Lady Gaga revelou ao Portal Léo Dias ter ficado decepcionada após esperar por 15 horas para ver sua artista favorita e sair sem sequer um aceno. A admiradora, que tem deficiência visual, permaneceu por longa horas com fome e sem acesso a um banheiro na frente do hotel. No entanto, a artista driblou os fãs e não fez nenhuma aparição. Se sentido desrespeitada, a fã da artista decidiu não comparecer ao show neste fim de semana: “Não vou sábado. Com certeza. Não venho. Não se faz isso”, disse ela, revoltada.

author: Agencies
title: BJP to project Modi as Hindu Hriday Samrat in LS polls, says Shashi Tharoor
text: BJP to project Modi as Hindu Hriday Samrat in LS polls, says Shashi Tharoor New Delhi, Dec 29 (PTI) The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) is set to contest the 2024 Lok Sabha polls on the issue of Hindutva by projecting Prime Minister Narendra Modi as the "Hindu Hriday Samrat", Congress leader Shashi Tharoor said on Friday. In a post on X, Tharoor noted that Modi is set to inaugurate the Ram temple in Ayodhya on January 22 and the BAPS Hindu Temple in Abu Dhabi on February 14, following which the general election would be announced. The Congress MP from Thiruvananthapuram said the Lok Sabha election is shaping up to be a Hindutva versus popular welfare battle, and questions on economic growth, creating two crore jobs a year and putting disposable income into the pockets of every Indian need to be debated. "The message is clear. In 2009, Mr Modi was sold to the Indian electorate as the avatar of economic development, the CEO of Gujarat Inc., who would bring development to all Indians. In 2019, with that narrative collapsing in the wake of the disastrous demonetisation, the Pulwama terrorist attack gave Mr Modi the opportunity to convert the general election into a national security election," Tharoor said. "In 2024, it is clear the BJP will now revert to its core message and offer Narendra Modi to the nation as a Hindu Hriday Samrat," he added. "Hindu Hriday Samrat" literally translates to the emperor of Hindu hearts. "All of this begs the question: what happened to achhe din? What happened to two crore jobs a year? What happened to economic growth that would benefit the lower rungs of the socio-economic ladder? What happened to putting disposable income into the pockets and bank accounts of every Indian?" the Congress leader asked. "These questions will have to be debated in an election that is shaping up to be Hindutva versus popular welfare," the former Union minister said. PTI
